title: Applied Business Analytics
description: Hands-on analytics projects for managers focused on SQL, experimentation, and business decisions.

title: Digital Marketing Strategy
description: Covers performance marketing, attribution models, and digital channel strategy.

title: Product Management
description: Teaches roadmapping, MVPs, and stakeholder alignment for product leaders.

title: Valuation
description: Focuses on discounted cash flow, comparables, and corporate valuation techniques.

title: Leading People and Organizations
description: Explores leadership, motivation, and team effectiveness.

title: Corporate Strategy
description: Frameworks for diversification, competitive advantage, and global expansion.

title: Supply Chain Analytics
description: Optimization and simulation techniques for managing supply chains efficiently.

title: Managerial Accounting
description: Introduces cost behavior, budgeting, and performance measurement systems.

title: Investments
description: Portfolio theory, asset pricing, and risk-return tradeoffs in capital markets.

title: Negotiations
description: Interactive course on bargaining, conflict resolution, and influence.

title: Big Data Management Tools
description: Hands-on use of SQL, NoSQL, and cloud tools for data storage and retrieval.

title: Brand Management
description: Covers positioning, brand equity, and marketing communications strategy.

title: Artificial Intelligence for Business
description: Introduces AI applications, machine learning, and ethical considerations in business.

title: Competitive Advantage
description: Strategy frameworks to analyze market forces and build sustainable advantage.

title: Managing Change
description: Addresses how to lead organizational transformation and change adoption.

title: Private Equity and Venture Capital
description: Examines deal structures, valuation, and exits in PE/VC markets.

title: Decision Modeling
description: Quantitative modeling techniques to support managerial decision-making.

title: Legal Aspects of Management
description: Explores contracts, corporate law, and intellectual property for managers.

title: Leading Diverse Teams
description: Focuses on inclusion, diversity, and equity in organizational leadership.

title: Tech Product Strategy
description: Explores product-market fit, scaling technology products, and AI-driven business models.
